column2: ggplot(d1, aes(x = as.factor(sex), y = as.factor(smoker), z = fit)) + geom_raster(aes(fill = fit)) +

coord_fixed()   + labs(subtitle="Female:Non-Smoker",x="",y="") +  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5), axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.title.y=element_blank(), text = element_text(size=11))
